job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pForbes believes in the power of entrepreneurial capitalism and uses it on various platforms to ignite the conversations that drive systemic change in business culture and society We celebrate success and are committed to using our megaphone to drive diversity equity and inclusion We are the worlds biggest business media brand and we consistently place in the top 20 of the mostpopular sites in the United States in good company with brands like Netflix Apple and Google In short we have a big platform and we use it responsiblyppbrppAs a data scientist at Forbes on the Business Intelligence team youll have the opportunity to work on a variety of unique and interesting challenges Youll be part of a highly effective team who are leveraging data science to advance our business and drive revenue growthppbrppResponsibilitiespulliOwn the development of new and existing machine learning models with a focus on increasing revenue and helping the site understand its users and competitorsliliResearch and develop solutions to varied and complex business problems that touch all areas of data science regression classification forecasting nlp clustering etcliliSome current areas of focus include text classification recommendations audience segmentation multitouch attribution and churnliliPerform data mining on large structured and unstructured datasets to uncover insightsliliContinuously improve your skills and knowledge through classes and independent researchliulpbrppWhat You Bringpulli12 years experience as a data scientist preferably in the publishing industryliliMS in computer science applied mathematics or other quantitativecomputational discipline from a top Western universitylili12 years experience with Python amp SQLlili12 years relevant work experience with popular machine learning open source libraries pandas numpy sklearn TensorflowKeras etc APIs cloud computing Google Cloud Platform preferred databases BigQuery preferred Web Analytics Google Analytics 360 preferredliliSolid understanding of traditional machine learning techniques feature engineering and data cleansinganalysisliliRealworld experience with natural language processing regression classification clustering and time series forecasting Familiarity with deep learning approaches a plusliliDemonstrated problem solving skills and ability to present complex problems clearlyliliExperience creating data productsliliExperience presenting findings to internal stakeholders at different levelsliliKnowledge of data visualization tools iematplotlib plotlyliliProject Management experience a plusliulpp
